meanings.definition: Directly opposite in character or tendency
meanings.sent1: Their opinions on the matter were polar opposites.

meanings.sent3: It was like they were from polar worlds, yet somehow they got along.

meanings.sent5: The contrast between them was as stark as the poles of a magnet.
